outline:
1. to divide, separate
    1. (Hiphil)
      1. to divide, separate, sever
      2. to separate, set apart
      3. to make a distinction, difference
      4. to divide into parts
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to separate oneself from (reflexive of 1a2)
      2. to withdraw from
      3. to separate oneself unto
      4. to be separated
      5. to be excluded
      6. to be set apart
kjv_def: (make, put) difference, divide (asunder), (make) separate (self, -ation), sever (out), [idiom] utterly.
strongs_def: to divide (in variation senses literally or figuratively, separate, distinguish, differ, select, etc.)
